name: CYBERFIELD
description:
The game takes place in a sci-fi world where warrior's combat skills are highly valued. You are the next contender for the prestigious title of the Cyberfield Champion. But are you worthy of the commemorative Statue in your honor?

In Cyberfield, your goal is to create a unique combination of skills and upgrades to defeat the Champions of each Section. You will be presented with a list of skills from which you can choose only 5 that are most suitable.

Additionally, you can use Enhancers – powerful technological devices that grant you special powers. Fire, ice, lightning, energy, defense, and more – an arsenal to suit any taste.



You will have to overcome multiple rounds, facing a variety of opponents – from staggering giants to precise drones. But the ultimate test of your strength will be battles against Special Warriors and reigning Champions.

In Cyberfield, defeat is not the end, but an opportunity to learn from mistakes and improve your approach. Embrace the unforgiving nature of the roguelike genre and constantly refine your tactics. Use accumulated coins to upgrade your fighter to the maximum.

Learn, adapt, and conquer!



Get ready to show your character and willpower on the path to Cyberfield Championship. The Steel Arenas are full of traps and dangers, but only the bravest warrior awaits the true reward – the feeling of personal perfection.

Forward to the arena!
